players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Terrible news about Bob. I didn't notice anything suspicious before—Bob seemed calm. We should focus on gathering info before voting."
Charlie: " Alice is the mafioso — I investigated last night. We need to vote her out now."
Diana: "Charlie, that's a big claim — did you investigate Bob or Alice? What result did you get?"

Charlie: "Yes, I investigated Alice last night and my result is clear: Alice is the mafioso. Bob was killed at night — that fits with Alice trying to sow doubt. We need to vote Alice now before she gets another chance."
You: "Charlie, those are serious accusations — can you explain exactly how your investigation works? Who else did you investigate before naming me?"
Diana: "Charlie, if you really investigated Alice, tell us one detail only the investigator would know: what role did Bob have when you checked him (or what night result format did you get)?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
